HeaderOne.location: to the top of the container

ModeToggler.location: to the right of the SearchBar

ToggleBtn.location: to the right of the ModeToggler button

NotificationPopup.description: opens on first toggle button clicked

MassagePopup.description: opens on second toggle button clicked

StorePopUp.description: opens on third toggle button clicked

Author.location: to the right of the ToggleBtn
Author.description: opens the popup containing user basic information

ProfilePopup.description: opens a dropdown of some navs

HeaderTwo.location: to the top of the page

ResProfilePopup.location: to the right in the container

Sidebar.location: to the left of the page, fixed
Sidebar.description: collapsible, to the left, on toggled

menuItems.description: list of menus in column that contains svg followed by menu in a flexed container

SidebarV2.location: to the left of the page, fixed
SidebarV2.description: collapsible, to the right, on toggled
SidebarV2.children: svg of the menus in smaller screen and when toggled

Support.location: below the header, to the right of the SideBar
Support.description: holding the main components of the page

SupportHeader.description: In the summary, there is a graph displaying data related to each month.

SupportTicket.location: left side of top of the supportHeader

RecentSupport.location: bottom of the support right side of the supportHeader
RecentSupport.description: it containe varrious type of support inforamtion inside include chat and rating image different type of varrious

GreenBorderBtn.location: it is beside of the inbox box
GreenBorderBtn.description: it is represent of the complete process

RecentSupportItem.location: it is the top of the recent top and second one is bottom of the revent top
RecentSupportItem.description: it is represent of the chat processsm and rating process

CustomerInfo.location: top at the right side of the support
CustomerInfo.description: it containe image and just sending inbox

ContactInfo.location: bottom of inbox and right side of the support
ContactInfo.description: it is showing contact informaation and email address

ShippingAddress.location: it is bottom of the contact information
ShippingAddress.description: it is showing that product reached to the delivery adddress

PresentAddress.location: it is bottom of shipping address
PresentAddress.description: it is showing user present location

Note.location: bottom of present location and right side of support

Progressbar.location: at last bottom of the  right side of support
Progressbar.description: it represent progress of the profile and also verfie of profile
